articles.author: Nino Paoli
articles.title: Deloitte was caught using AI in $290,000 report to help the Australian government crack down on welfare after a researcher flagged hallucinations - Fortune
articles.description: The updates “in no way impact” the report’s findings and recommendations, the Big Four firm said.
articles.content: Deloittes member firm in Australia will pay the government a partial refund for a $290,000 report that contained alleged AI-generated errors, including references to non-existent academic research pa… [+3045 chars]
